description: The Butterfly bush (Buddleja davidii 'Buzz Violet Blue') is an amazing plant species to have in the garden. It is an attractive, bushy shrub which produces masses of vibrant, violet-blue flowers all summer long. The flowers are particularly attractive to butterflies and bees, creating a vibrant buzz of activity in your garden. The plant is drought resistant, easy to look after, and copes well with most soils, making it a useful addition to any garden. Its vibrant and long-lasting flower display will give your garden a splash of colour throughout the warm months. Its bright, distinctive flowers make it a real eye-catcher!
